Articles.Content: I've been on the forum for a couple months, but I've never made a post here. With the release of 1.0, I think now would be the best time to post here. So hi. I'm temporalExile. I like space, and making sarcastic comments. Hi...

Welcome!

I'm surprised you already have 2 rep bars!

> 
> I'm surprised you already have 2 rep bars!

> 
> ...and making sarcastic comments...

5chars
You got +100 rep for your sarcastic comments? Yeah, right.
